sourceMeaningMnemonic: This <radical>cage</radical> with <radical>treasure</radical> in it is actually a map of the <kanji>district</kanji> the treasure is in.
meaningInfo: Picture a big pirate map, and on it are a bunch of these markers for the districts where you can find the treasures you've been searching for.
readingMnemonic: There is one <kanji>district</kanji> you're interested in, and that's the <reading>coo</reading>kie (<ja>く</ja>) district.
readingInfo: The treasure of the cookie district is cookies, which you want. And to be fair, even if you weren't a pirate, you'd probably want those cookies.
